channel.title: Help!important!
channel.description: i need help i ave "ddsspeced" source and wenever i try to press run.bat it says its online and wen i go to moparscape and type in the server ip and my name and pass it says: "error connecting to server server must be down click cancel and start server to make your own"

item.title: Help!important!
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

1)make sure your on the right port i.e. 5555 or 43594
2)Try not using your ip just leaving it blank OR typing “localhost” as the ip and it should work

Read full topic
